channel.title: Java Batch file making is annoying you?
channel.description: i made a few simple batch files for helping Java productivity in my spare time :D enjoy!

item.title: Java Batch file making is annoying you?
item.dc:creator: @pizza_pie pizza pie
item.description:
@pizza_pie wrote:

[quote=“Mod Taharok, post:21, topic:123807”][quote author=shangtsung1 link=topic=173627.msg1601252#msg1601252 date=1184595819]
i made a few simple batch files for helping Java productivity in my spare time enjoy!
[/quote]

Seems useful shangsung1. It will help those who do not understand that, when using Windows, batch files make our lives somewhat easier.[/quote]

So true.

Read full topic
item.source: Java Batch file making is annoying you?

item.title: Java Batch file making is annoying you?
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

[quote=“Yz85Racer, post:19, topic:123807”][quote author=LoveScaper link=topic=173627.msg1606026#msg1606026 date=1184725648]

Lol, atleast you try, unlike the others… @LoveScaper, please go back to moparscape.
[/quote]why don’t you? flammer[Size=1pt]what’d[/Size].[Size=1pt]i[/Size].[Size=1pt]do?![/Size]

Because you’re the one who has Scape in their name.[/quote]

And I have “mod” in my name? Does that mean you have a stereotype against me as well?

LoveScaper:

hmm maybe it’s because i can login to this forum using the same user and pass shesh

And what good does it do to continue the argument by posting back? What, is it worth going through all this trouble just to win an argument over the internet? It all seems like a bunch of bologna to me…

shangtsung1:

i made a few simple batch files for helping Java productivity in my spare time enjoy!

Seems useful shangsung1. It will help those who do not understand that, when using Windows, batch files make our lives somewhat easier.

Read full topic

item.title: Java Batch file making is annoying you?
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

Frell:

Batch? Rofl FTW? i make all my developers in java.

Stop ragging on him.
And why is everyone cutting him no slack?

pizza pie:

then tell me who is lazier, you or him?

You.
Tell him what he could improve[quote=“LoveScaper, post:7, topic:123807”]not me when i make java file makers i use line1; line2; line3; not line1;line2;line3;[/quote]
Then you could of told him that would be a good way to do it.

Read full topic
